jobDescription: Sapho is looking for a team-centric, detail-oriented Sales & Marketing Data Analyst to join our team in San Bruno, California. Positioned at the intersection of three primary departments at Sapho—Sales, Marketing, and Operations—this role provides the opportunity to learn the ins and outs of how a business operates.  As a data analyst, you will not only be challenged to improve your analytical, critical thinking, and communication skills, but you will also gain invaluable experience in developing and optimizing the data-driven processes that power a business. What you will do:Understand and thoroughly analyze data from the sales and marketing teams, with a heavy focus on translating numbers into meaningful insights that drive smart decision makingCollaborate with your manager, the sales team, and the marketing team to pull relevant, insightful dataLearn and become a proficient user of the systems we use to house company data, such as Google Analytics, Salesforce, Hubspot, etc.Actively explore and learn how to use potential tools we could implement to provide more relevant, valuable dataOur requirements:No prior experience neededEnthusiasm for learning new thingsSelf-motivated, detail-oriented, and analyticalFamiliarity with working with and analyzing dataProficiency with Google and Microsoft Office products (e.g. Google Analytics, Excel, etc.)Craftsmanship – tremendous care for work and the output of that workStrong communication skillsA Bachelor’s degree from a top university
